__e: I think it had to do with something entirely different... and I understand.
Ever since you hooked up with this band, you're like a completely different person, and I don't like it one bit.
But we can make him believe he's a different, better person, and we can hope that leads to a different, better answer.

Every time I handle a case like this, I wonder what the victims go through emotionally. I imagine you can see things, from the perspectives of both victims and offenders. Well it's just not too far off.
All this is new to me. unlike anything I've seen and maybe...
- Sometimes I see a situation different...
